about_the_game:
OM6N - A BRUTAL HORROR SHOOTER

This Demo features Tutorial as the only playable level.

Learn the fundamentals of survival in OM6N's unforgiving world.

Purchase the game to gain access to more guns, levels, and demons!

OM6N is still in Early Access! *
Warning: Contains flashing lights & imagery *[/i]
